channel.title: Destscape needs some help
channel.description:
ok before i can start the server i need to know how u can change the shop prices example: if i put a phat in varrock shop whit shop.cfg and then go to the shop ingame and it sells for 1 gp i want to let it be sold for 31mil
searched for guilds and found nothing used the search button and found nothing i know its possible saw it on other servers
